text:
Hi All,
I am just trying to build a basic(small) eCommerce using Hub CMS, so i just would like to know how i can achieve the below features...
1. Multiple Item in cart
2. Place Order on checkout Page using payment gateway.
3. How i can i implement Stripe or Instamojo payment gateway?
4. Is it possible to manage Invoice or Tax
5. Here is my url checkout link <http://19946885.hs-sites.com/checkout?id=1157134119> 
6. Product List: <http://19946885.hs-sites.com/products>
7. Cart: <http://19946885.hs-sites.com/cart?id=1157134119>
Pretty sure you can access theme settings from anywhere in your theme that accepts hubl. But you can also just assign css variables your theme setting colors and use them in css anyplace.

When you create the property, you will set   `"hasUniqueValue": true,`
Can I also do it to properties in  a default objects such as the company object that is created by HubSpot?
